title: Barley in a dream  Interpretation of seeing barley in a dream for a married, pregnant, and single woman

preview.html: My dear brothers, my dear sisters, in this article we will discuss the interpretation of seeing barley in a dream according to what is stated in the most famous books on dream interpretation and vision interpretation, where we first learn about the meaning of barley in a dream from Al-Nabulsi and then the meaning of barley according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. This article also contains a detailed interpretation. To see barley in the dream of a married and pregnant woman, as well as an unmarried woman and a girl, we wish everyone happiness and satisfaction. Continuously useful, God willing. Barley in a dream Interpretation of Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabul: It is stated in the book “Animal Smell in the Interpretation of a Dream”: Barley in a dream indicates immediate good nutrition and less fatigue, and whoever sees in a dream that he sold wheat for barley, then in his wake he will replace the good with something less than it, and it was said: He forgot the Qur’an, And he worked in poetry. Whoever dreams that he is carrying barley in his hand or hand, then, God willing, he will be blessed with a child. As for buying barley in a dream, it indicates possession or permanent influence, and harvesting means money quickly, and barley in a dream is the feeling that something is happening to him with a lot of goodness. Barley In a dream | Interpretation of Sheikh Muhammad Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said in his famous book (Interpretation of Great Dreams): Barley in a dream indicates permanent wealth and a healthy body for the one who sees that he is preserving it, gathering it, or eating it, and the interpretation is better. Despite wheat. Harvesting barley or collecting it in bags indicates money if the dream is at harvest time, and planting it means an act that requires the Creator’s satisfaction. Whoever dreams in a dream that he is walking on land planted with barley, then by the grace of God he will receive the blessing of his diligence, and seeing barley in general indicates ease. In all circumstances, it is good, beneficial and nourishing. And healing.Interpretation of seeing barley in a dream for a single girl or girl. Barley in a dream for an unmarried person looks good. If he sees that he is buying it, it is a sign of profit or benefit, and if he sees that he is eating it, it is a sign of permanent livelihood or a happy life. Collecting or reaping it indicates collecting money if the harvest is on time. A bag of barley in a dream indicates an abundance of money if the bag is full, and indicates its scarcity or shortage if the bag is empty or empty. As for barley bread, it is a sign of blessing in a woman’s dream, and its connotations can be multiple. According to the girl's intentions and aspirations. Barley bread in the vision indicates a good, eternal life and may indicate good news or a happy event that coincides with the harvest season. What is praiseworthy in a dream is to see barley soaking in water, because a barley drink in a dream indicates the body’s health and recovery, unless this drink is Fermented. Interpretation of seeing barley in a married woman’s dream. Barley in a married woman’s dream indicates the continuity of a comfortable life, especially if she dreams that she is making bread from it. Whoever sees a married woman as if she is kneading barley flour, then, by the grace of God, she will be a righteous woman who will benefit her family and her family, or benefit a lot after being tired or struggling. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing or eating barley soup or stew, this is interpreted as ease in Profit or life after distress or fatigue. Maybe it refers to barley soup

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing sand in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream: Sand is considered one of the natural materials that make up rocks and is characterized by its small size and soft texture. One of the most important materials that make up sand is silica, and the diameter of sand grains ranges from 0.7 mm to about 5 mm. Sand has multiple uses as it is used in the glass industry and other industries. Interpretation of sand in a dream: The interpretation of seeing sand in a dream indicates that the dreamer owns something expensive or property in large quantities, such as a luxury car or a large house. A lot of sand in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness. Or the birth of many children, and it is good news that the dreamer will have wonderful offspring. Whoever sees a lot of sand in his dream, this indicates that he will travel abroad and earn money and profit from this trip. If an unmarried woman sees sand in a dream, and it is in motion, and it can For the person she loves to save her from the danger of those quicksands, it means that she has found a man with qualities of kindness and morals. She will be happy to live with him and marry him. Soft and fast sand is evidence of the dreamer’s loss in his business and the loss of friends close to him and those he loved. But if the dreamer sees sand in the form of feelings, this indicates people’s thirst to collect money by any means. If the dreamer sees that he collided with sand and it fell between his fingers This indicates that he is a spendthrift and cannot save his money. When you see sand in the form of dunes in a dream and the dreamer cannot cross it, this indicates that he faces many obstacles in reality and stands in front of them and is unable to solve them. Because it exceeds the level of his ability to solve problems. If an unmarried woman sees that she is drowning in sand, this means that she will immerse herself in the affairs of life, her work, and collecting money, and will not care about marriage. If a divorced woman sees sand in her dream, and that she is collecting it, this is evidence that she will gain all her rights from her marriage. Previous.Interpretation of a dream about white sand: White sand indicates life and access to wealth and riches, and white sand can indicate that the dreamer has obtained or bought silver.Interpretation of a dream about walking on sand: If the fortuneteller finds it difficult to walk on sand, this indicates He has fallen into problems that exceed his capabilities, and he will stand in front of them for a long time until they are solved and eliminated. Seeing sand in a dream: You have a dream that is confusing you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Seeing sand in a dream for a married woman means that she is suffering from some problems in her life, and these problems It led to a deterioration in her mood and psychological state. When the dreamer sees the sand that was moving under his feet, and it led him to fall or dive into it, this means that he will fall into many problems that he will not be able to control, and thus it will have many dire consequences on his life. And mental health. If an unmarried woman sees sand in her dream, this indicates her need for calm and comfort, as well as the passion and love that she lacks, and it could be good news for marriage and getting rid of all the problems that she suffers from. The previous period. The vision of the

title: Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing crying in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing crying in a dream means stopping worry and anxiety, paying off debts, hearing good news, crying loudly and crying, and denoting calamity and destruction, and hearing bad news. When presenting the interpretations of the great imams in the interpretation of dreams and visionaries such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and other interpreters, ancient and modern, so follow us on his website to see the interpretation of crying in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing crying in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing crying In a dream, it signifies the end of worry and anxiety and the elimination of debts. Whoever sees that he is crying in a dream, it portends a lot of goodness and overcoming adversity and hardship, as well as longevity and recovery from sickness and disease. Seeing crying with the sound of screaming and crying indicates hearing sad news and distress that may befall the viewer. Seeing a young man crying without tears in a dream indicates that his marriage is approaching relief, some distress and anxiety. See also: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman crying in a dream? Seeing crying in a dream for a single woman indicates achieving one’s goals, achieving what he desires, and hearing the news. Sarah. If an unmarried woman sees herself crying with tears, it announces that she will marry a good and religious young man and be happy with him. If an unmarried girl sees herself crying over a dead person in a dream, this indicates a failure in worship and may indicate mistakes that may occur. See also: Interpretation of a vision A brother crying in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing crying in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees that she is crying without a sound, it indicates the approaching date of birth, easy delivery, and the baby is in good health. Seeing crying and crying in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will be exposed to troubles and sorrows, pregnancy and childbirth, or a problem. She faces it. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman crying in a dream? Seeing crying with a loud voice and crying in a dream for a married woman indicates problems, worries, marital and family problems, and disobedience to children. If a married woman sees that she is crying with tears, it indicates the stability of her marital life and the collapse of problems and quarrels. Seeing crying without a sound in a dream For a married woman, it appears that she will be pregnant soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child crying in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman crying in a dream? Seeing crying with tears in a dream indicates success and success in her life and again in her marriage. If he sees her crying and screaming, it expresses the distress and anguish that he caused her Problems. If a divorced woman sees someone crying, she announces the end of her anxiety and hears the happy news. See also: Interpretation of seeing a mother crying in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about crying tears? Seeing tears in a dream portends very good things and the death of worry, anxiety, joy and pleasure. A vision of a young man crying without tears indicates the approach of his marriage. What is the interpretation of dreaming about someone you love crying? Seeing someone you love crying in a dream indicates his need for help and prayers and he may be in distress. Seeing someone you love crying indicates the death of worry and worry and a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing a corpse

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead king in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the deceased king in a dream via the website roy2a.com. Seeing a dead king in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, achieving a distinguished position, good luck, and hearing happy news. In this article, we will explain the interpretation of the deceased king in a dream: a man, a young man, an unmarried woman, as well as a married woman, or the pain of some imams. Such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other modern-day translators. Follow us on the Vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing the late king in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing yourself sitting with a deceased king in a dream indicates a lot of kindness, abundant sustenance, prestige and illustrious status. To God. Seeing the grave of the dead king in a dream indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and goals. Seeing sitting with the deceased king and eating with him in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a sum of money or pleasant surprises such as a prestigious job and a distinguished social status. Dreaming of the funeral of a dead king in a dream indicates That he will assume a leadership position and that good will will come. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Mulk in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the deceased king in a dream for a single woman? Seeing her sitting with the deceased king in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will attain a bright future and her marriage to a person of rank and position. Telling the girl to shake hands with the king or the deceased president in a dream indicates to the girl that the obstacles in front of her will be overcome and that what she was hoping for will come true. See also: Interpretation of seeing the king’s gift in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the deceased king in a dream for a married woman? Telling the dead king In a dream for a married woman, it indicates promotion to the position of her husband. Dreaming of greeting the king and shaking his hand in a dream for a married woman indicates family happiness, strong attachment to the family, and distinguished social status among the people. What is the interpretation of seeing the deceased king in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing the deceased king smiling in a dream For a pregnant woman, it indicates the birth of a son who has a high social status among the people. If a pregnant woman sees that the king is giving her a gift, this indicates ease of childbirth and the cessation of fatigue and pain. See also: Interpretation of seeing jihad in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the deceased king in a divorced woman’s dream? That A divorced woman sees a dead king and smiles at her in a dream, this means good luck and the fulfillment of her dreams. Seeing a dead king giving her a gift in a dream means that her marriage to a wealthy person who has fame and social status among the people, otherwise she will get a prestigious job. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead king in a dream? A dream gives me money? Seeing the deceased king giving money to the dreamer means that he heard good news and God compensated him with many good things in his practical and emotional life, advancing his job and improving his financial level. Seeing the deceased king giving money to the monarch and smiling in a dream indicates happy circumstances and the fulfillment of a wish. He was trying to achieve it. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Kafirun in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the dead president in a dream and talking to him? Seeing talking with the dead president

title: What is the interpretation of olive oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing and eating olive oil in a dreamInterpretation of olive oil in a dream We will explain through the following lines of our article, as olive oil is famous for its many benefits and its many uses in treating skin and hair problems and is used in alternative medicine. Let us not forget that olives were mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, so seeing them in a dream must reveal many elements and meanings. Seeing olive oil in a dreamSeeing olive oil in a dream symbolizes the lawful money that the dreamer will obtain during the coming period of his life - God willing - and it is also a sign of recovery from illness, if the dreamer is sick or complains about something. Olive oil indicates that good news is on its way to the dreamer. Whoever dreams of a bottle of olive oil or a bottle of olive oil, this vision indicates a righteous wife who is characterized by high morals and religion. Olive oil in a dream indicates an abundance of money, blessings and an increase in knowledge as well. Whoever sees olive oil in his dream, this vision portends an improvement in relations with those around him, and seeing it is evidence of responding to the request as well. Interpretation of olive oil in a dream and turning its turbidity into pure and pure olive oil is a sign of good treatment and trust in others. Olive oil for pregnant women Site An Egyptian specialist that includes a group of leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Olive oil in a dream for a pregnant woman is good news that she will be able to give birth and will not face difficulties or fatigue during childbirth, if a woman sees in her dream that she is buying olive oil. Seeing a pregnant woman with olive oil in a dream is good news about the increased nutrition and ability of the woman and the expected child - God willing -. While a pregnant woman dreams of yellow olive oil, this dream indicates that she will face difficulties and some problems during her birth. What does olive oil appear in a dream for Ibn Sirin? Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin says in the dreamer's vision of squeezing olives to extract their oil, this is a good vision for the dreamer and heralds lawful food, abundant goodness and blessings, God willing. Ibn Sirin's interpretation of olive oil in a dream for a married woman, if it appears yellow or black, is an indication of problems and disputes between her husband that may lead to her divorce. Seeing green olives is a good vision for a pregnant woman and for an unmarried woman, it is good for a pregnant woman that she will give birth easily and have a boy who pleases her eyes and makes her happy. Heart. In the case of an unmarried woman, seeing green olives in her dream is good news that she will marry a man of good morals and religion. Ibn Sirin says that the olive tree in a dream indicates a good moral person who cares about the justice of his family. Eating olive oil in a dream Interpretation of olive oil in a dream If the dreamer sees himself drinking it, then this vision can be good news for the dreamer in the case of a sick person that God (Glory be to Him) will heal him. Eating olive oil in a dream is a sign of love and the relationship between family members and each other. Eating olive oil in a dream is good news for the dreamer that his affairs will be easy, and eating

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house The house is the treasure that people enjoy in complete peace and quiet, and when the dreamer sees in a dream the guests of the house and it was dirty, he feels very shocked and wants it not to be true because this is shameful In this article, we study together the most important things that have been said about this dream. Interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house The dream of seeing visitors in a dirty house indicates the news that the dreamer will hear during this period. If the guests arrive suddenly and the house is dirty, something bad has happened to its owner and perhaps something bad. When the sleeper sees in his dream that he is receiving guests and the house is dirty in the dream, this leads to many changes in his life. Interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house by Ibn Sirin The person who dreams that he receives guests in a dream, this dream shows very good and the tremendous blessing that he will receive. If the dreamer receives guests and the house is dirty, it symbolizes the degree of his unpreparedness for anything in the coming period. Seeing the house dirty and the guests arriving to the dreamer symbolizes being exposed to some problems and worsening crises or suffering from a difficult psychological state. And the married woman who sees House guests in a dream indicate extravagance and paying money for something that is useless. A married man who dreams that guests are in his house and that it is dirty, this symbolizes the marital problems and quarrels that he will suffer. Interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house for unmarried women An unmarried girl who dreams that guests are in the house and that it is dirty means that she will suffer from many problems. If the fortune teller sees in a dream guests in her house and it is disorganized, this leads to the emergence of some unpleasant things in her life. An engaged woman who sees in a dream that she is receiving guests and that the house is dirty, means that she will be exposed to disagreements with her fiancé and will end up separating. If the girl was studying at some point and saw that she was receiving visitors and the house was unclean, this indicates a complete failure in all her stages. Interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house for a married woman A married woman who sees guests in a dream and the house is dirty means that she will face many problems and we will see family quarrels. If a woman sees that she is receiving guests and the house is dirty, this symbolizes many bad changes in her life. And seeing a lady in a dream that guests are in her house and in A state of chaos, this means that some bad things will happen to her and she may get sick. Interpretation of a dream about guests and a dirty house for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who dreams that there are guests in a dream and the house is dirty means that she will suffer from the pains of that period and suffer from a difficult psychological crisis. And if the dreamer sees that she is in her house and it is dirty and she receives guests, this means that there are many problems with her husband. Also, seeing a lady receiving guests in a house full of dirt indicates fears and difficulties that you cannot overcome. And a woman who sees garbage bags piled up in the house and the presence of guests means that she spends a lot

title: Interpretation of the meaning of seeing numbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq in detail

preview.html: A large number of interpreters explained the meaning of seeing numbers in a dream in detail, which express many connotations and interpretations, as the dreamer can see them in a dream in the form of an amount of money, a date, a specific address written in a place and other forms that appear in it. But each number has its own interpretation, which differs from one person to another according to his social status, psychological state, and other matters related to the dreamer. These numbers can express good or bad evil, as explained in the books of most interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of Tashahhud in a dream. Interpretation of the meaning Numbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the number one in a student’s dream is one of the signs that he will be among the first this year. As for the second number, if it appears in a dream of a newly married couple, it may indicate the birth of two children in their married life, God willing. As for the number Three is one of the numbers that indicates the abundance of sustenance and money for the owner of the dream. Number two, if an unmarried girl or an unmarried man appears in a dream, this indicates the approach of marriage or an official engagement. Interpretation of a dream about screaming in a dream. Interpretation of the meaning of numbers in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq says Imam Al-Sadiq: If the second number appears in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates that that woman will give birth to twins. The number five is one of the numbers that indicates getting rid of the malicious and envious from the dreamer’s life. Zero is one of the numbers that indicates the dreamer’s inability to achieve goals. Which he seeks in life. As for the number ten, it indicates the achievement of many achievements in the field of work or studies, depending on the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about cake in a dream. Interpretation of the meaning of numbers in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that if the number five appears in a married person’s dream, it indicates The presence of many marital problems in their lives. As for the number seven, it indicates the dreamer’s abundant livelihood and the acquisition of lawful money without effort and hardship. The numbers six, seven, or eight could be an expression of the number of loyal friends in the dreamer’s life. The number nine in a man’s dream is one of the dreams that indicate Achieving goals and dreams for the dreamer. Interpretation of the dream of seeing apricots in a dream. Interpretation of the meanings of numbers in a dream by Al-Asidi. Al-Saidi believes that the number ten is one of the numbers that shows the intelligence and wisdom of the dreamer. Zero is one of the numbers that indicates that the dreamer will fall into some crises and debts in the near future. As for a pregnant woman who sees some numbers in a dream, such as 3, 4, 5 or others, this may be the number of months remaining for that woman until she gives birth to her baby. Al-Asidi says that the number seven in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the baby is male and that the number nine It indicates that the baby is female, and God Almighty knows what is in the wombs. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child’s bed in a dream. Interpretation of the meaning of numbers in a dream in Miller’s Encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about seeing palm trees in a dream. The number is one of the numbers that indicates that the dreamer has reached a position Distinguished in his work and he may be

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about driving a car in a dream with a man I know?  And seeing a car riding in a dream, and a white car in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of driving an Arab with someone you know. A car in a dream is one of the things that refers to life in general, and this is what many dream interpretation scholars have interpreted, and it comes in several different places, which differ in interpretation from one person to another depending on the situation. What it comes in, as well as its form, and through this article, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing riding a car in a dream and its various connotations. Driving in a car in a dream with a man I know about the man. In the event that you see an outing with one of the people close to this insight in the field of work, this is an indication of That he gets a lot of money and expansion in work, or that he gets a large sum of money, a high position, or a promotion in his work, especially if signs of happiness appear in the dream. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Leadership The car in a dream with a man I know by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees in a dream driving a car with a man he knows as a sign that he will achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time and this will make him very happy. If one sees in his dream that he is riding in a car with one of his acquaintances, then this A sign of the abundance of blessings that he will enjoy in his life out of the fear of God Almighty in all his actions. In the event that during his sleep the dreamer sees a car trip with someone he knows, this expresses a lot of profit behind his business, which will flourish greatly in the coming days. Vision The dreamer in his dream driving a car with a man he knows indicates good things that will happen in his life and will be promising for him. If someone sees in his dream that he is riding in a car with a man he knows, this is a sign of good news that will reach him in the coming periods and will spread a lot of joy and happiness around him. Driving a car in a dream with a man I know for single people. If you see her in green, and there is a person next to her, this means that her future husband will have high morals, be close to God Almighty, and have a good biography and reputation in the making. title: The most important interpretations of seeing the dream is that I married someone other than my husband with Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I got married to someone other than my husband. Marriage is the norm of life and all people seek it to settle down, start a family, and start a life of comfort and happiness. A woman's marriage to her husband is forbidden by law. She married someone other than her husband in a dream. She is overcome by feelings of anxiety and tension and seeks to know the meaning of this dream. In interpretation, dreams carry many interpretations that vary depending on the dreamer’s condition. In the following article, we will present in detail all the cases and their interpretations: I dreamed that I married someone other than my husband. Watching a married woman in a dream marry someone other than her husband indicates that she will receive a lot of kindness and livelihood. In the event that a woman wants to change her job and is looking for another job and sees in Her dream that she married a man other than her husband, this indicates that God will answer her prayers and give her the job opportunity she wants. Some commentators mentioned that a woman’s marriage to someone other than her husband is evidence that she will become pregnant with a new child. The dreamer’s marriage to someone other than her husband in a dream symbolizes Moving from her home to a new, more beautiful and comfortable home. The dreamer dreams of marrying someone other than her husband, and that this person has already died, which indicates her loss of money and being exposed to a financial crisis. The woman married someone other than her husband, which indicates that she assumed many responsibilities and was able to Do all of them perfectly. I dreamed that Ibn Sirin married someone other than my husband. Ibn Sirin interprets the marriage of a married woman to someone other than her husband as a sign that she and her family will obtain many benefits and good things. If the dreamer is married and has children, and she sees her marriage contract with someone other than her husband in In her dream, this symbolizes the marriage of one of her children soon. A woman’s marriage to a man other than her husband may indicate that she or her husband will pursue a new business investment and reap a lot of benefits from it. I dreamed that I married someone other than my husband and I am single. I dreamed that I married someone other than my husband and I was single. I have seen that it has many interpretations that differ from one case to another depending on the situation of the viewer, and we will explain that below: Seeing an unmarried girl married in a dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding, and that may be to someone known to her. To dream of getting married in a dream is a sign that she will get Many suitable opportunities in the coming period, which she must take advantage of so that she can achieve her desired ambitions. If the dreamer sees himself marrying someone he does not know and hates in a dream, this symbolizes that he will have the opportunity to travel and move from one place to another. I dreamed that I got married Who is not my husband and I am married? Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is marrying someone other than her husband, and that this person has already died, and they enter an unknown house, indicates the approaching date of the dreamer’s meeting with God and her exit from life. A dream of a woman marrying a man she knows is dead in reality and she saw the wedding In a dream, which indicates her illness or the ill health of a family member. I dreamed that I married someone other than my husband and I am pregnant. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream marrying another man besides her husband

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my son bothering me in a dream. We may see strange dreams, so we present what they mean according to the interpretations of scholars and translators. Interpretation of a dream about my son bothering me in a dream and more... Interpretation of a dream about my son bothering me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son bothering me in a dream. It may be evidence that he has committed his sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees That her son is mistreating her in a dream, she can express his evil actions that he does, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Seeing my son being harassed can indicate trouble and misery, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees that her son is mistreating her in a dream, this It may indicate injustice, and God knows all that is unseen.
